title: Fully furnished studio 16m2
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Fully furnished studio for rent in the city centre, near CHATELET metro station and a few minutes walk to the Marais.
Fully equipped kitchen, shower and WC.
13m2 + a mezzanine 3m2 = total space 16m2.
6th floor walk-up.
Safe and quiet.
600 euros per month including building charges and water.
Real-estate agency fee to be paid on top of the rent (one time fee).

To schedule a visit, please contact us via WhatsApp on +33663087837 or send us an email on Craigslist.
